org.forgerock.cuppa.junit

Class CuppaRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.runner.Runner
      • org.forgerock.cuppa.junit.CuppaRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.runner.Describable

    public final class CuppaRunner
extends org.junit.runner.Runner
    A Runner for running Cuppa tests and notifying the JUnit framework of test results.
